orderly.title: Orderly (E-invoicing SaaS)
orderly.description: Built the primary UI and a reusable component system using React, TypeScript, and Bun
orderly.fullDescription: Electronic invoicing SaaS platform designed for small and medium-sized businesses. Led the complete frontend development, implementing a modular and reusable design system with React and TypeScript. Used Bun as runtime to significantly improve compilation and development times. The architecture includes state management with Zustand, form validation with React Hook Form, and a highly responsive user interface built with Tailwind CSS. Implemented key features such as PDF invoice generation, real-time analytics dashboard, and a robust authentication system with roles and permissions.

serviestiba.title: Serviestiba (Logistics Management)
serviestiba.description: Management system for stevedoring and port logistics operations
serviestiba.fullDescription: Serviestiba is a web-based requirement management and service control project designed to optimize stevedoring operations across various companies and branches, such as Molitalia or Nestlé. The platform enables the organization and control of stevedoring services, including assigning stevedores to requirements, tracking attendance and absences, and monitoring operations in detail. Additionally, the system features PDF document management, linking files directly to services, companies, and assigned personnel, thereby centralizing all documentation in one place.

viajaya.title: Viaja Ya (PWA)
viajaya.description: Progressive Web App integrated with Google Maps API and real-time Geolocation
viajaya.fullDescription: Progressive Web App that won first place in an international hackathon in Cartagena, Colombia. Developed a platform utilizing Google Maps API for optimized routes and real-time geolocation. Implemented advanced PWA features such as offline functionality, push notifications, and device installation. A standout feature is its Artificial Intelligence agent, which generates personalized itineraries based on user tastes and preferences within the app, significantly enhancing the travel experience. The backend is built with Node.js, and the application is optimized for mobile performance with lazy loading and code splitting.

altoq.title: Altoq (Informed Vote Peru 2026)
altoq.description: Web platform providing information on political parties and promoting informed voting for the Peru 2026 elections
altoq.fullDescription: Civic web platform dedicated to promoting informed voting in Peru ahead of the 2026 general elections. The application centralizes and presents detailed information on political parties, candidate resumes, and government plans in an accessible and transparent manner. I developed the user interface using Next.js, prioritizing speed and SEO to maximize citizen reach. Implemented interactive tools to compare proposals, visualize candidate histories, and access electoral educational resources, all aimed at strengthening democracy through information access.

skillconnect.title: SkillConnect (E-learning)
skillconnect.description: Full-stack educational platform featuring performance optimization and protected routing
skillconnect.fullDescription: Educational web platform designed to offer a structured learning experience through pre-recorded courses. I developed a comprehensive solution that allows students to access on-demand video content, take interactive quizzes to assess their knowledge level, and track their progress in detail. The platform includes secure authentication, user profile management, and an automated assessment system. The main focus was to create an intuitive and fast interface, optimizing multimedia content delivery and ensuring smooth navigation between lessons and evaluation modules.
